tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE manufacturing_processes (
	process_id INT,
	process_name VARCHAR(255),
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE,
	quality_standard VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Manufacturing (
    manufacturing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_id INT,
    product_name TEXT,
    manufacturing_date DATE,
    quantity_produced INT
);

CREATE TABLE QualityControl (
    qc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    manufacturing_id INT,
    test_type TEXT,
    test_date DATE,
    pass_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE manufacturing_process (
    process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_audit (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    process_id INT,
    standard_id INT,
    audit_date DATE,
    outcome VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES manufacturing_process(process_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (standard_id) REFERENCES quality_standards(standard_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Manufacturing_Units (
  unit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  unit_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  capacity INT,
  site_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES Manufacturing_Sites(site_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Manufacturing_Records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  unit_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  quantity_produced INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (unit_id) REFERENCES Manufacturing_Units(unit_id)
);

CREATE TABLE manufacturing_processes (
  process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  message TEXT,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
